definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: "Our priority is the pets," Binder said.
sentences.chinese: “宠物是我们的头等大事，”宾得说。

sentences.english: A; I've got a long-lens Pentax and a cassette recorder.
sentences.chinese: 我带了一个长镜头宾得相机和一个收录机。

sentences.english: Can a light meter on a Pentax manual camera get jammed?
sentences.chinese: 宾得手动相机的测光表会坏吗？

sentences.english: I don't agree, I think Pentax philosophy is strinkingly similar to SAAB.
sentences.chinese: 我不同意，我觉得宾得哲学类似萨伯。

sentences.english: We would like to express our heartfelt appreciation for your patronage of PENTAX products.
sentences.chinese: 我们谨表示衷心的感谢您的惠顾宾得的产品。

definition: Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments
see 單反相機|单反相机[dan1 fan3 xiang4 ji1]
Ricoh, Japanese imaging and electronics company
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
